fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication

eu_initiatives: Initiatives in the field of taxation (direct and indirect), in the field of e-commerce including on interoperability, in the field of intellectual property rights, in the field of freedom of expression and in the field of culture.

commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on Forest-based Industries and Sectorally Related Issues#E01356#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1356#Member#C
goals__remit: The Federation of European Publishers represents 29 national associations of publishers of books, learned journals and educational materials of the European Union, the European Economic Area and other European countries. Thus, FEP is the voice of the great majority of publishers in Europe. It acts in the name of publishers in the discussions and negotiations with the European Institutions concerning mostly the copyright legislation, information society, taxation and culture.
